      • setElements

        public void setElements(java.util.List<Draw> elements)
        Iterates through all drawable elements and "draws" them on the map. If said elements implements interface Update, update is added
        Parameters:
        elements - all elements that will be added to the map

      • updateTimer

        public void updateTimer(long speed,
                        Controller timeController)
        Updates timers, takes care of adding 30 secongs every second
        Parameters:
        speed - can be slowed down/speeded up by this number
        timeController - controls things that happen with time
